issue.title: [Docs][CI] Clean up some docs warnings and increase CI timeout
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16994](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16994). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The docs are starting to take just about 30 minutes to build, causing spurious timeouts.

Also, there are several warnings that could/should be fixed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16994?focusedCommentId=17563793) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13533
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13533>
